power.title: Censure the Unholy
power.fluff: Brandishing a holy symbol, you drive undead away and bolster allies against them

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wearing or holding a holy symbol, or another similar item.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 until the end of your next turn.
Allies in the zone gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against undead creatures. Also, you can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Free Reaction:
section.text: Trigger: An undead ends its turn in the aura; You push the triggering undead 1 square.

power.title: City Dweller
power.fluff: Your familiarity with cities tells you what will support your weight and helps you perceive things that are out of place

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would make an Acrobatics check, and Athletics check, or a Perception check in an urban environment

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your Streetwise check modifier in place of the triggering skill's check modifier.

power.title: Conceal Psyche
power.fluff: You hide the core of your identity deep in your subconscious

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 power bonus to Will, and a +4 power bonus to saving throws against Charm and Psychic effects.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can also use this power with the following trigger and effect:

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You start your turn and are dominated

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a saving throw against the dominating effect. If the effect normally allows a saving throw, you gain a +2 power bonus to this save.

power.title: Concealed Shift
power.fluff: Your enemy misjudges your position, giving you a chance to duck out of the way

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy misses you with a melee or ranged attack while you have concealment or cover from it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square, or shift 2 squares to a space where you have total concealment or total cover against the triggering enemy.

power.title: Confusing Blather
power.fluff: You spew a stream of nonsense, leaving your enemies puzzled

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Check:
section.text: Bluff vs. passive Insight

section.name: Success:
section.text: The target cannot make opportunity attacks against you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Crushing Escape
power.fluff: You smash free from your enemy's grasp, sending it reeling and making it susceptible to your next attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make an escape attempt using Athletics

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to the triggering check.
If you escape, and a creature was grabbing you, that creature gains vulnerable 5 to your attacks until the end of your next turn.
If the grabbing creature is your size of smaller, you can choose to push it 1 square instead of shifting yourself.

power.title: Deliverance of Faith
power.fluff: You give yourself in the belief that somewhere, something will give a little back

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value.

power.title: Demonic Bargain
power.fluff: You call on a demonic entity to wreak greater havoc, but tear a part of your mind in the process

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You roll damage and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reroll the triggering damage, and use the second result.
After the triggering power has been resolved, you take psychic damage equal to twice the power's level. Any resist psychic you might have does not apply to this damage.

power.title: Demoralize Foe
power.fluff: You spit an ugly threat at your adversary, making it think twice before it attacks you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an adjacent enemy with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Temporary Inoculation
power.fluff: Your ministrations briefly protect your patient from poison

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a healer's kit.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is immune to poison until the end of your next turn.
